file_content.text: You shut down the sensors. I'll watch your back.
Lana. What is it?
I have a surprise: schematics for the Darvannis factory, procured by Theron.
They're patchy, but they should help you and the Mandalorians concoct a battle plan.
Good. I should have GEMINI Prime soon. Anything else?
One delicate matter. The Mandalorians make fierce allies, but I have certain concerns.
Your people have never prioritized pacts and treaties above their love of war. I fear our arrangement can't last.
Mandalore and I have an understanding. I've earned the clans' respect. My brothers and sisters can help defeat Zakuul.
Don't worry about the clans.
You're talking about my family. Be very careful what you say next.
Watch your tone.
You've always had my respect. But you must think of the galaxy, not just your people.
Despite their code of honor, the clans have always had... animalistic tendencies toward violence. I fear our arrangement may not last.
I know how you think, Lana. If you want something done, tell me.
What do you propose?
Treat the Mandalorians with respect, you'll get respect in return. I've spent enough time with them to see that.
I think they're trustworthy.
I don't mean to say they'll plot against us. But in the long term?
Mandalorians want a challenge more than anything else. They don't like staying on the winning side.
Agreed. They're dangerous.
We're in agreement, then.
The clans have opposed both Republic and Empire in the past. Raided planets for sport. Now imagine them free after Zakuul is beaten.
Predators are beautiful, but they mustn't overrun an ecosystem. I trust you'll do what's right to hold our friends in check.
